::Firaxis::
       "Well, actually I couldn't care less what happens here.  I, well ... 
my dog died and I came here to get a new one.  Unfortunately I'm a few 
million years too early."  He glares back at her.  "And I don't much like 
your referring to my kind that way."

--part1_23.1bf6d604.29db6c2f_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::Firaxis::
<BR>       "Well, actually I couldn't care less what happens here.  I, well ... my dog died and I came here to get a new one.  Unfortunately I'm a few million years too early."  He glares back at her.  "And I don't much like your referring to <I>my kind</I> that way."</FONT></HTML>

--part1_23.1bf6d604.29db6c2f_boundary--
